tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Geeta is extremely patient and soft spoken , I was extremely paranoid after hearing i had to do the biopsy but after I met Dr Geeta , she made me feel at ease She explained each and every step of the procedure patiently and even assured that even if I feel slightest of pain she would not go ahead , I would recommend Dr Geeta to each and everyone and especially to those  who get paranoid with gynaec checkups . she makes you feel very comfortable and does not make you realise about the pain at all . üëåüëåüëåüòç

review: We met Dr. Geetha.S .She did a great job , explained everything to me  very clearly. She was also kind and friendly. All of the staff was great ‚Äì they were helpful and patient.

review: Not given right directions, we have to rush to many places for test, in place like SAKRA HOSPITAL But still not able to do it beacuse no person was available and even who are there not aware of what to do. Not any asisstant available after we came out of doctor cabin.

review: I m consulting doctor Geetha since april these 5 months her consultation was very much satisfactory for me in all the ways. I will recommend her .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Geetha is very gentle and approachable. She is very  professional *** ************** As a patient she made me feel very comfortable and calm.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Geetha  is very friendly and understanding. I am a bit shy person. I was not able to explain my issues properly. She made me comfortable and listened to me very patiently. Afterwards she only explained me what can be the issues and asked me not to worry as its a small issue. And its very common in women once they become sexually active.
Prior to this I had a very bad experience with one of a very reputed doctor but Dr. Geetha gave me back the confidence to trust the doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: *** ** * **** ******. She listened my case history very carefully, gave time to examination properly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Friendly, helpful, have good patience... happy with the tips and the treatment. I would recommend Dr. Geetha to all the ladies.

review: She is very calm and composed, very friendly, patient, observes your problems and listens patiently, examination was also very peaceful, and arrived at the conclusion. Very positive, I would recommend this doctor for any of your gynaecological issues
